modName: Mother of Tears Tome 1 and Tome 2
summary: Questline, dungeons and Epic encounters, try your character in a new game content, the harder actually released !
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#add8e6]After all the hard work, if you like it, Endorse it ![/color]

[img]http://www.freegamesunity.com/Mother_of_Tears/Images/Nexus/MoT%20Title%20800.jpg[/img]

Please report any trouble you encountered using the mod !

August 11 2012: Tome 1 Armors and Weapons are now in the Wiki - 
You can find all the informations on armors and weapons, enchantment and more. Go to the Items section. 

August 02 2012: Feedbacks needed ! All is welcome to correct.
Tome 2 name: Blindness of a shiny Dawn
Chapter 1 name: Eyes in the dark
How to use it:
Load your savegame with the mod checked, save, reload and play (fixe for 1.7 Skyrim Update).

Tome 2 Chapter 1 Test Version 0.2.0.0 is released ! Nexus Exclusive.
No voices, but anyway lot of content and loots.
Enable the subtittles !

July 27 2012:
The 1012 update is now posted in the nexus.
[url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Wiki/index.php?title=Main_Page]Visite the Wiki for more details[/url]

All the previous files are needed

[b]
From the higher mountains to the frozen sea, discover the new epic saga the Mother of Tears.
Across 4 Tomes, you will have to explore and fight in the most dangerous places you ever visited in Skyrim. 
Raise armies, find your allies will be your unique way to defend yourself from the ancient threats of the Nord. 
Dragons are awaken, gathering the enemies of humans, dealing secret alliances in the darkness of the giant nests.
Learn who could be your friend and who should be your enemy, the time is becoming darker, shadows of the past are approching.[/b]

[url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Index.html][img]http://www.skyrimmotheroftears.com/Site/Images/UI/MoT%20child%201_fgu%20x800.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Index.html][img]http://www.skyrimmotheroftears.com/Site/Images/UI/epic%20narthis%20FGU%20x800.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Index.html][img]http://www.skyrimmotheroftears.com/Site/Images/UI/dungeon%20DDR3%20x800.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Index.html][img]http://www.skyrimmotheroftears.com/Site/Images/UI/dungeon%20DSJT3%20x800.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Index.html][img]http://www.skyrimmotheroftears.com/Site/Images/UI/dungeon%20Ebony3%20x800.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Index.html][img]http://www.skyrimmotheroftears.com/Site/Images/UI/dungeon%20Island%20x800.jpg[/img][/url]

[b][color=#add8e6] - The VERSION 1 is now released, after 6 month, it is all yours, world wild Fantasy friends. Please comment the release, any bug, any CTD, any problem ? We will try to help you soon as possible.

Vyemm
[/color]

[color=#add8e6] - The usual users good news: Noreset, you keep all your progress in MoT.[/color]

- The  [url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Index.html]Website[/url] is now opened, with a  [url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Wiki/index.php]WIKI[/url] and a [url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Forum]Forum[/url].

[color=#add8e6] - All the Update Notes and the [url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/News.html]News[/url] will be posted on the [url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Index.html]Website[/url].[/color]

- You now can visite the various sections by clicking on the icons from our Nexus Page (ie: click on the Update icon to connect to the right page).
[/b]
[/center]
[url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/News.html][img]http://www.freegamesunity.com/Mother_of_Tears/Images/Nexus/MoT%20Update.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Overview.html][img]http://www.freegamesunity.com/Mother_of_Tears/Images/Nexus/MoT%20Features.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Wiki/index.php][img]http://www.freegamesunity.com/Mother_of_Tears/Images/Nexus/MoT%20Wiki.jpg[/img][/url]
[center]

[youtube]UneSulUAFCw[/youtube][youtube]ApO7UmxTgiM[/youtube]
[center]
[img]http://www.freegamesunity.com/Mother_of_Tears/Images/Nexus/MoT%20Install.jpg[/img][/center]

How to configure Skyrim to play the Mother of Tears:

-Run the SkyrimLaucher.exe
-Enter the Data Files options of the SkyrimLaucher

-Place \"the MoT_First_LoadOrder_File_After_Skyrim.esm\" at the first position (after \"Skyrim.esm\" if \"Skyrim.esm\" is displayed).

-Place the \"MoT_Last_LoadOrder_File.esp\" at the end of you load order. When another mod is installed, keep the MoT_Last_LoadOrder_File.esp at the end.

-All the other \"mot - XXXXX.esp\" can be placed anywhere in the load order excepted the first and last places.

-Launch the game and play.



The Mother of Tears Team,
Boopi, Vyemm
author: Vyemm
